Plot: set in a dreary urban landscape of an anonymous canadian city, love and human remains is a dark comedy about a group of twentysomethings looking for love and meaning in the '90s. the film focuses on roommates david, a gay waiter who has has given up on his acting career, and candy, a book reviewer who is also david's ex-lover. david and candy's lives are entangled with those of david's friends (a busboy, a psychic dominatrix, and a misogynistic civil-servant) and candy's dates (a male bartender and a lesbian schoolteacher). meanwhile, a serial killer menaces the concrete and asphalt neighbourhood in which david and candy live.
Title: love & human remains
